code: import React from"react";import redStar from"../assets/redStar.svg";import greyStar from"../assets/greyStar.svg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Rating(_ref){let{rating}=_ref;const fullRating=[1,2,3,4,5];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rating",children:fullRating.map(score=>rating>=score?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"rating__icon",src:redStar,alt:"\xE9toile pleine"},score.toString()):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"rating__icon",src:greyStar,alt:"\xE9toile vide"},score.toString()))});}export default Rating;
